How can I clear gedit text search / replace history?

08 Dec 2012

Start gconf-editor: [bash]gconf-editor[/bash]

Go to /apps/gnome-settings/gedit/history-gedit2_search_for_entry and /apps/gnome-settings/gedit/history-gedit2_replace_entry_with and remove the content there:

[caption id="attachment_50181" align="aligncenter" width="512"] gedit: Clear text search / replace history[/caption]
